---
title: "LogNormal-Results-Processor"
format: html
---

I will begin by loading three things.  

1. the data that were stored from creating the batch file.

```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(jsonlite)
library(tidyverse)
load("rlnorm--5-1.RData")
```

2. The queries

```{r}
LNormM51Call <- stream_in(file("rlnorm--5-1-Call-Revised-0409.jsonl"))
```

3. The Results

```{r}
LNormM51Result <- stream_in(file("rlnorm--5-1_0409_output.jsonl"))
```

## Merge the call and the result

```{r}
LNormal.M5.1.OpenAI <- left_join(LNormM51Call,LNormM51Result)
Full.LNormal.M5.1.0409 <- left_join(LNormalM51$params, LNormal.M5.1.OpenAI)
```

The file is saved as `Full.LNormal.M5.1.0409.RData`.

Put the result in the params file.

```{r}
Full.LNormal.M5.1.0409$Outcome <- map_chr(LNormalM51$params$iter, function(x) { unlist(LNormM51Result$response$body$choices[[x]][[2]][2]) })
table(Full.LNormal.M5.1.0409$Outcome)
```

```{r}
save(Full.LNormal.M5.1.0409, file="Full.LNormal.M5.1.0409.RData")
```
